name: event-resolver
description: Cross-venue event resolver. Matches equivalent events across prediction markets (Kalshi, Polymarket) and maps them to underlying assets on CEX/DEX.

jobs.name: resolveEvents
jobs.description: Scan Kalshi and Polymarket markets for equivalent events, build cross-references, and map to underlying assets.

jobs.name: onMessage
jobs.description: Triggered when a new message arrives from kalshi or polymarket modules. Checks for cross-venue equivalents.

settings.description: Minimum confidence threshold for event mappings
Weight for text similarity in matching (0-1)
Weight for embedding cosine similarity in matching (0-1)
How many hours of history to scan for matches
